meanings.definition: The quality or state of being splendid or magnificent.
meanings.sent1: The splendiferousness of the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: Her dress sparkled with splendiferousness at the ball.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at wearing a crown only added to the splendiferousness of the moment.
meanings.sent4: The city's skyline was a display of splendiferousness against the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The splendiferousness of the waterfall was truly awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: A splendid or magnificent quality or state.
meanings.sent1: The splendiferousness of the garden was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The splendiferousness of the palace left visitors in awe.
meanings.sent3: The children's laughter added a touch of splendiferousness to the party.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of splendiferousness in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The splendiferousness of the mountain view was unforgettable.
